archimate:BusinessFunction.name: ILS planning and management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: ILS planning is part of the change process and redefine planning according to the ECP received. --- Context: H160 The main pain points for the planning: - Lack of a single solution to plan activities, - Lack of a solution connected to the system in which deliverables are produced, - Not all disciplines are part of the change process, - Not easy to use solutions for planning (OPX tools, CorePDM), - Too many solutions and data spread over too many solutions (OPX, CorePDM, SCDM, SAP Pricing, EBP, Spotfire, sharepoint for internal and external collaboration, 3D Prepa, 3D Player, NECTAR for the certification documents). For the H160 program, approximately 350 ECP for data creation and 150 ECP for update for the 1st baseline. As an average, it is key to keep in mind up to 400 ECP per year. --- H175 ILS planning & management H175 program is currently developing 2 new versions: - VIP - Public services For the H175 program, changes are tracked down to the iteration. For the H175, this is up to 600 changes a year, representing 2000 issues a year. Note that in serie phase, approximately 250 to 300 changes are issued per year. What are the main issues: - Because of the process, high volume of information is lately delivered, - The access of the data requires many tools: ECPDM (Catia / VPM), EPP175, SAP, PUZZLE (note that PUZZLE should migrate to CorePDM), - Technical problem when installing on the machine (problem of industrialization), - Low level of commitment on ILS costs due to high number of iteration of changes, - Access to the data of the ILS Disciplines. --- Improvements Axis As improvements for the ILS : - Feedback from production about the rank of embodiment of a change, - Lack of study to determine the opportunity to integrate the change earlier on the machine and on already delivered machines, - Better visibility of the helicopter configuration, - Reduce the variability to reduce the volume/costs of stocks, - Right first time.
